entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a main character in the story. He is mentioned as getting up from the table and being drawn aside by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a main character in the story. She whispers urgently to Harry about not letting Ron see something on the Slytherins' badges.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a main character in the story. He looks lost and desperate as he approaches Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is one of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The Slytherins' badges are mentioned in the story.

relationships.description: Hermione takes Harry's arm and draws him to one side.
Harry is friends with Ron, as evidenced by their interactions in the story.
Hermione gives Ron a kiss on the cheek and wishes him good luck.
Harry casts a curious glance at the Slytherins' badges as they pass by.
